title: Shekhar Home
overview: Set in 1990s Lonpur, Bengal, “Shekhar Home” combines suspense & comedy as eccentric Shekhar and his new housemate Jayavrat solve a variety of cases while interacting with a vibrant cast of characters in a charming, pre-technology era.

tv.episodeOverview: Shekhar & ex-army doctor Jayavrat Saini team up to solve a series of murders in Lonpur marked by a "horse shoe" symbol. As Jayavrat evolves from roommate to partner, a shadowy figure known as "M" ominously watches Shekhar from the shadows.
